alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Monroe; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 11:17PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bibb, southern Monroe, southeastern Upson, Crawford, east central Talbot and northern Taylor Counties through 1145 PM EST... At 1117 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Salem, or 9 miles west of Roberta, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Butler, Roberta, Payne, Culloden, Payne City, Lake Tobesofkee, Bolingbroke, Russellville, Musella, Cross Keys, Knoxville, Wesleyan, Howard, Lizella, Skipperton, Arkwright, Salem, Prattsburg and Sandy Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Monroe; Talbot; Taylor; Upson
